name: The Rare Nine
description:
The Rare Nine - ultrafast and explosive action platformer, in which you should break through the darkness and hordes of undead in a endless skyscraper. Also you can enjoy a lot of great chiptune music.

You can fight with a lot of different bosses, and then buy some unique upgrades for your character by spending cash, which drops from the dead enemies.

We are giving you a chance to choose an unique hero. Every character has its pros n' cons. If you can fully take control your hero, you will become godlike destroyer in this hell. Buddy I think you got the wrong door, the paradise club's two blocks down.Key features:
  • Ultrafast and dynamic gameplay, where reaction are not most important thing, also you can buy some upgrades for your character, after boss fights.
  • Various effects, which you can get with damage. Here's temporary effects, like: bleeding, poisoning, slowing movement. As permament effect - breaking bones, that type will downgrade your character.
  • Every choosed character is unusual by his abilities and absolutely different parameters.
  • Totally different and unlike each other, bosses, which are chosen randomly.
  • A huge variety of rooms filled with different objects, consisting of a pure pixel.
  • The style and appearance of the locals really impressive
  • Game music are completely consists from chiptune tracks
  • Strict palette, gives a special atmosphere to the gameplay

For people with photosensitive epilepsy is strictly not recommended, at the moment there is no option in the game that disables all provoking factors.
